chunks.text:
*	Are you curious about the best route to start or accelerate your procurement and supply career?
*	Not sure which CIPS qualification is right for you?
*	Want to understand more about Applied Learning or how the Procurement Excellence Programme can benefit your organisation?


You're not alone and now’s your chance to get the answers you need.

Join Sam Achampong, Regional Director, AMEA, for an open, interactive Ask CIPS session designed to address your most pressing questions. From Entry Routes and study options to corporate solutions and advancement opportunities, this live Q&A is your gateway to unlocking the full value of what CIPS has to offer.

Whether you're a student, professional, employer, or just exploring the world of procurement, this session is for you.


*	Gain clarity on your next steps
*	Learn how CIPS supports individual and organisational excellence
*	Ask anything - it’s an open forum!


Register now <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/-Ff1CrMz4TxGox2FNuGi4ZLhW?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  and bring your questions - your future in procurement starts here!
